animeTitle: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann: Mitee Mono wa Miteen da!!
animeDescription: An uncut version of episode six, involving Kamina's hopes of seeing Yoko and The Black Siblings naked, even at the risk of his friends' safety. (Source: Wikipedia)
